text:
@realDonaldTrump @OANN You’re right, Mr. @POTUS — I hate that he was pushed & hurt but the video shown on tv doesn’t show the public that he waved his hand holding some sort of electronic devise around the officers’ belt area.

One can’t do things like that to police officers @NYGovCuomo #COVID19 #CNN

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: The Situation Room
entity.description: "The Situation Room With Wolf Blitzer" is the command center for breaking news, politics and extraordinary reports from around the world. Patterned after the concept of the White House Situation Room, CNN's lead political anchor Wolf Blitzer hosts newsmakers and experts to discuss and analyze the stories that are driving today's news.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Anderson Cooper 360
entity.description: Anderson Cooper goes beyond the headlines with in-depth reporting and investigations. Through nightly "Keeping Them Honest" reports, Anderson keeps his commitment to holding those in power accountable. And, of course, there's the RidicuList, a tongue-in-cheek commentary on the day's news that may leave viewers (and Anderson) laughing. Joining him are guests that frequently include political and legal analysts.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Erin Burnett OutFront
entity.description: Anchored by Erin Burnett, "OutFront" stays ahead of the headlines, providing objective reporting on the day's top issues. The Monday to Friday nightly news program features compelling newsmaker interviews, provides lively debates and offers in-depth analysis of the latest news and global headlines. "I want people to say that our show is smart. I want our show to be authentic," Burnett says. "I want our show to have courage."

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: The Lead With Jake Tapper
entity.description: CNN's chief Washington correspondent, Jake Tapper, hosts this hourlong weekday afternoon program, which covers all the day's top stories from around the country and the world, headlines that span politics, money, sports and popular culture. "The Lead" works to ensure that viewers are caught up on the stories that matter, often highlighting news that may have been overlooked. Prior to joining CNN, Tapper served as senior White House correspondent at ABC News.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: CNN Newsroom with Brooke Baldwin
entity.description: Brooke Baldwin anchors this weekday afternoon edition of "CNN Newsroom" from the network's New York bureau. The program, featuring CNN correspondents, analysts and guests, brings viewers live coverage of the latest news, current events, and headlines from around the world.
